amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Defense to implement recommendations of the Comptroller General of the United States relating to critical military housing supply and affordability.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2952 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2952 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Warnock to Amendment SA 3748. To require the Secretary of Defense to implement recommendations of the Comptroller General of the United States relating to critical military housing supply and affordability.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2952 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2952 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Warnock to Amendment SA 3748.
